channel.title: Azure Pipelines on Sully Squared Blog

item.title: How I embed Saucelab Build Videos into Azure Pipelines
item.description: Overview of Saucelabs For those of you that don’t know, within the QA Automation world there are many tools in which we can leverage to distribute and run our Selenium tests on. One popular tool that I’ve used in the market is Saucelabs. While it is entirely possible to utilize your CI job’s resources to run these tests, one thing that made using Saucelabs very appealing to me was the ability to actually view video playback of your test in action.
